accounts.name: expected_authority
docs: The caller must provide this account to prove they have the right to initialize

errors.name: NFTNotInCollection
errors.msg: NFT is not part of the specified collection

errors.name: SellerDoesNotOwnNFT
errors.msg: Seller does not own the NFT

errors.name: SellerCannotBuy
errors.msg: Seller cannot buy their own NFT

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Only the admin can perform this action

errors.name: InvalidFeeBasisPoints
errors.msg: Invalid fee basis points - must be <= 10000

errors.name: OfferExpiryTooLong
errors.msg: Offer expiry time is too long - maximum 1 year

errors.name: UnauthorizedProgramInitialization
errors.msg: Unauthorized program initialization - only program authority can initialize
